author: wrowe
msg: NEVER default to ALTERNATE_SEARCH_PATH!!!  It's a great last resort,
but a lousy first choice.  Provided that httpd was mislocating libapr,
ssleay32, etc, from the wrong locations.  Still, it's a good fail-over.
